ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_axicn | |- _i e. CC |
| 2 |  | #P_rei | |- ( Re ` _i ) = 0 |
| 3 |  | #P_0z | |- 0 e. ZZ |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_eqeltri | |- ( Re ` _i ) e. ZZ |
| 5 |  | #P_imi | |- ( Im ` _i ) = 1 |
| 6 |  | #P_1z | |- 1 e. ZZ |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_eqeltri | |- ( Im ` _i ) e. ZZ |
| 8 |  | #P_elgz | |- ( _i e. Z[i] <-> ( _i e. CC /\ ( Re ` _i ) e. ZZ /\ ( Im ` _i ) e. ZZ ) ) |
| 9 | 1, 4, 7, 8 | #P_mpbir3an | |- _i e. Z[i] |
